Texts.Chs: 把^orange;高级塑料^reset;带给这名科学家。 (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset; to the scientist at the ^green;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 真棒！你会需要很多塑料的，所以就多储存一些吧。
Texts.Eng: Excellent! You'll need a lot of plastic, so keep well stocked.

Texts.Chs: 如果你想成为一名科学家的话，你会需要很多^orange;高级塑料^reset;的。在^green;沙漠^reset;中找到一些^orange;油^reset;，或者从^orange;骨粉^reset;中提取一些，然后在你的^orange;生化实验室^reset;着手制造。给我拿来一块吧！
Texts.Eng: If you're going to make it as a scientist, you are going to need ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset;. Find some ^orange;Oil^reset; from a ^green;Desert^reset; or from ^orange;Bonemeal^reset; and then head to your ^orange;Bio Lab^reset;. Bring me back one single piece!
